user_query: I am planning a surprise anniversary party for my parents. Can you help me find some romantic love quotes to include in the decorations? Also, I need a translation of the phrase 'Happy Anniversary' in Italian to create a special banner. Finally, can you suggest some venues in Austin, Texas for the party?

TaskList.description: Find romantic love quotes to include in decorations.
Translate the phrase 'Happy Anniversary' into Italian.
Suggest venues in Austin, Texas for the anniversary party.
